# Weekly Study Checklist Template

Copy this block once per week.

```text
Week of:
Primary thinker:
Primary text:
Target pages/sections:

[ ] Read primary text (session 1)
[ ] Read primary text (session 2)
[ ] Build vocabulary list (10 terms)
[ ] Write argument map (1 page)
[ ] Read one secondary source
[ ] Write 5-bullet critique
[ ] Write modern application paragraph
[ ] End-of-week reflection (What changed?)

Carry-over tasks:
Next week focus:
```
